TEXT.PASSWORD_CHANGED_INFORMATION: The password has been successfully changed.
TEXT.OWN_USER_DATA_INFORMATION: Your information have been updated successfully.
TEXT.GLOBAL_SETTINGS_CHANGED: The turtlepass configuration have been saved.

TEXT.ENABLE_PASSWORD_RESET: You can enable and disable the forgot password functionality.
TEXT.ENABLE_REGISTRATION: You can enable and disable the user registration here.
TEXT.ENABLE_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL: You can enable and disable the confirmation email here.
TEXT.MAIL_AUTH_MODE: The authentication mode to use when using smtp as the transport.
TEXT.MAIL_ENCRYPTION: The encryption mode to use when using smtp as the transport.
TEXT.MAIL_HOST: The host to connect to when using smtp as the transport.
TEXT.MAIL_PASSWORD: The password when using smtp as the transport.
TEXT.MAIL_PORT: The port when using smtp as the transport. This defaults to 465 if encryption is ssl and 25 otherwise.
TEXT.MAIL_SENDER_ADDRESS: You can enter your sender address here.
TEXT.MAIL_TRANSPORT: The exact transport method to use to deliver emails.
TEXT.MAIL_USERNAME: The username when using smtp as the transport.
TEXT.PAGE_TITLE: You can change your page title here.
TEXT.RECAPTCHA_NEEDED_FAILS: Enter the number of invalid login trials before a recaptcha will be shown.
TEXT.RECAPTCHA_PRIVATE_KEY: Enter your recaptcha private key here. (Leave blank to disable)
TEXT.RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY: Enter your recaptcha site key here. (Leave blank to disable)
TEXT.ONLY_WHITELISTED: Allow login only for whitelisted ip addresses. (Warning! Please whilelist your ip first)
TEXT.LDAP_USER_PROFILE_FULFILLMENT_REQUIREMEN: Is a new LDAP-User forced to fulfill his profile information.

TEXT.DELETE_INFORMATION: Do you really want to delete the user?

TEXT.USER_SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED: The user has been successfully added.
TEXT.USER_SUCCESSFULLY_UPDATED: The user has been successfully updated.
TEXT.ACTIVATE_USER_INFORMATION: Do you really want to activate the user?

TEXT.DEACTIVATE_USER_INFORMATION: Do you really want to deactivate the user?

TEXT.PASSWORD_MOVED: The password has been successfully moved.
TEXT.MOVE_SAME_PASSWORD_GROUP: The password is already in this group.
TEXT.ICON_SUCCESSFULLY_CHANGED: The icon has been updated successfully.

TEXT.NO_PASSWORDS_FOUND: No passwords found in this group.

TEXT.PASSWORD_GROUP_MOVED: The password group has been moved.

SHARE_LINK.SHARE_LINK_COPIED: The Share-Link has been copied to your clipboard

SHARE_LINK.DELETE_SHARE_LINK_COMPLETE: This link is no longer valid.

PLACEHOLDER.VIEW_LIMIT: How often can this password be displayed. (Empty is unlimited)

TEXT.UNKNOWN_ERROR_INFORMATION: An unknown error has been occurred. Please try again later.
TEXT.DELETE_NOT_FOUND: Unable to delete resource. Maybe it has already been deleted. Please try again later.
TEXT.OWN_ACCESS_EDIT_NOW_ALLOWED: You can not change your own access rights.
TEXT.USER_GROUP_DELETE_LOCKED: Group can not be deleted if users or accesses are allocated.

VALIDATION.MAX_LENGTH: Please do not enter more then {{characters}} characters.

TEXT.CONNECTION_FAILED: Connection to update check server failed. Please try again later or check connection to {{url}}.

TEXT.NEW_VERSION_RELEASED: New version {{version}} released. Please check documentation for update information.
